introduction: A short film about a father in mourning, trapped between worlds - the past, the present, this life and the next - the daughter Charlotte he leaves behind and a mysterious stranger. Driven by unshakable premonitions, Charlotte and the stranger risk everything to save her father and return him to the moment before everything important started to disappear.- Written by Giorgio LittA short film about a father in mourning, trapped between worlds - the past, the present, this life and the next - the daughter Charlotte he leaves behind and a mysterious stranger. Driven by unshakable premonitions, Charlotte and the stranger risk everything to save her father and return him to the moment before everything important started to disappear.- Written by Anonymous
